mapper.insert: replace into player ( playerId, avatarUrl, nickName, gender, language, country, province, city, lastGameId, createTime ) values ( #{playerId}, #{avatarUrl}, #{nickName}, #{gender}, #{language}, #{country}, #{province}, #{city}, #{lastGameId}, #{createTime} )

insert into game ( gameId, gameOwnerId, gameOwnerAvatarUrl, gameOwnerNickName, inviteCode, killerNum, policeNum, citizenNum, state, startTime, endTime, result, createTime ) values ( #{gameId}, #{gameOwnerId}, #{gameOwnerAvatarUrl}, #{gameOwnerNickName}, #{inviteCode}, #{killerNum}, #{policeNum}, #{citizenNum}, #{state}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{result}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select: select state from game where gameId=#{gameId}
select * from game where inviteCode=#{inviteCode} and state=0
mapper.insert: insert into role ( roleId, playerId, gameId, roleType, playerNickName, playerAvatarUrl, death, deathTime, victorySide, createTime, remark ) values ( #{roleId}, #{playerId}, #{gameId}, #{roleType}, #{playerNickName}, #{playerAvatarUrl}, #{death}, #{deathTime}, #{victorySide}, #{createTime}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: select * from role where gameId=#{gameId} and playerId is null
select * from role where gameId=#{gameId} and playerId=#{playerId}
select * from role where playerId=#{playerId} and roleType!=3 and victorySide is not null
select * from role where gameId=#{gameId} and roleType=#{roleType} and death=0
